headline: ServiceNow Shareholders Approve 5-for-1 Stock Split
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., December 05, 2025--ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW), the AI control tower for business reinvention, today announced that shareholders have overwhelmingly approved a 5-for-1 split of the company’s common stock. Shareholders of record as of December 16, 2025, will receive four additional shares for each share held, to be distributed after market close on or about December 17, 2025. Trading on a split-adjusted basis is expected to begin on December 18, 2025.

headline: Can Workflow Adoption Drive NOW Stock in 2026 Post 25% Drop?
summary: ServiceNow stock struggles amid slowing growth, but AI traction and new partnerships may shape a stronger 2026.
